file_insights.changes: Added localization keys for components like EmptyState, ErrorState, DeployWizard, and MigrationModal
Added Spanish translations for all components
Updated hardcoded strings to use translation keys, added useTranslation hook

patterns_discovered: Centralized translation management in JSON files
Nested translation key structure with components and sub-components
Bilingual support with separate translation files for English and Spanish
gotchas_discovered: Previously hardcoded strings in multiple components
No centralized translation strategy before this implementation
Potential maintenance issues with scattered string definitions
recommendations: Continue extracting strings from other components
Implement translation coverage checks in CI/CD
Use translation keys consistently across all components
